text: pinneyum avariruvarum munneattuninni. annane oru nattilettiyappeal a nattukareat avar annam ceadiccu. ennal avarkk atithyam nalkan nattukar sannad'dharayilla. avite pealinnuvilaraya oru matil avar kantu. addeham atu nereyakki. musa parannu: "tankalkku venamenkil itin pratiphalam vannamayirunnu.â€
